About Me

This is a travel app for the city of Rome to show you where the best tourist spots can be found along with transportation centers, information centers and restaurants.

The author of this site is Jacob Bryan and you can find out more about him at http://jakebryan.me

Currency Conversions

The Base Currency is Euros since Rome's official currency is Euros. Below you will find the up to date currecy conversion for common currencies to 1 Euro
